name: Vereniging Milieudefensie
goal:
Milieudefensie has been working toward a sustainable and fair Netherlands since 1971. If we share the earth fairly with each other, end pollution and take no more from the earth than it can support, prosperity will be possible for all: for ourselves, people in other parts of the world and our children and grandchildren.

Milieudefensie works with four themes:

Transport
Food&Agriculture
Forests
Energy

Milieudefensie works collaboratively with as many people as possible: locally, nationally and internationally, as a member of Friends of the Earth International.

Milieudefensie is an association with 84,000 members and donors. This association has paid employees and its national headquarters is in Amsterdam.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Climate Action, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, Environment, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Taxation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
Corporate Social Responsibility and Reporting/Transparancy
Common Agriculture Policy
Transport and Air Quality
Forest Protection
Energy and Climate
Circular Economy Initiative
Ecological Footprints
TTIP & CETA
